attributes.name: refPointPressure
attributes.description: Internal design pressure at vertical reference position

attributes.name: referencePoint
attributes.description:
Vertical reference position for internal pressure. 
Given as the Z coordinate in global coordinate system.

attributes.name: limitTimeInterval
attributes.description: Specify time window to be applied for assessment of utilization. In case "end time" exceeds the time series duration, the end of the time series will be used as the end time

attributes.name: addIntermediateResults
attributes.description: Add intermediate element results to the output

attributes.name: properties
attributes.description: Specification of nodes for displacement storage

attributes.name: useDistributionFitting
attributes.description: Calculate characteristic extreme values of utilization factors using Gumbel distribution fitting

attributes.name: seastateReturnPeriod
attributes.description: Return period used for estimating the characteristic extreme value

attributes.name: percentile
attributes.description:
Specify percentile in extreme value distribution. 
The value 0.57038 corresponds to the expected extreme, and 0.9 corresponds to 90% estimate of the extreme response
